stripped_text: When the Runner accesses Shi.Kyu, you may pay X credits. The Runner must take either X net damage or add Shi.Kyu to his or her score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Shi.Kyu from R&D.
text: When the Runner accesses Shi.Ky큰, you may pay X[credit]. The Runner must take either X net damage or add Shi.Ky큰 to his or her score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Shi.Ky큰 from R&D.
title: Shi.Ky큰
